messages.title: LABOUR IS AMBITIOUS FOR EVERY CHILD.
messages.content: The Tories are failing to deliver on the basics of education.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will introduce universal free school meals for primary school children, funded by introducing VAT on private school fees, reduce class sizes and drive up the quality of teaching in classrooms, and reintroduce an Education Maintenance Allowance and maintenance grants for students from low and middle income backgrounds.

issues.education: Our schools are suffering from Tory cuts. Class sizes are soaring and schools have more unqualified teachers. Rather than fix the problems, the Tories instead obsess over selective education, which will benefit only the lucky few.

images.caption: Labour is ambitious for every child.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Iain McNicol, General Secretary, Labour Party, on behalf of the Labour Party, both at Southside, 105 Victoria Street, London, SW1E 6QT. Printed by Potts Print, Nelson Park, Cramlington, Northumberland, NE23 1WG.
